mapper.select: SELECT T1.user_nickname AS userNickname, T3.image_url AS characterImageUrl, T2.grade_id AS gradeId, T2.total_stage_clears AS totalStageClears FROM TB_USER T1 INNER JOIN TB_CHARACTER T2 ON T1.user_id = T2.user_id INNER JOIN TB_IMAGE T3 ON T2.image_id = T3.image_id WHERE T1.user_id = #{userId}
